sys_variable_value.value:
Excellent! Next try the upgrade example I mentioned earlier ("upgrade paper sheets"), notice how the accrual rate per paper sheet will increase, but also notice how the price for the next upgrade goes up. You'll have to balance buying new assets and upgrading old ones.
Every once in a while, I'll chime in with some things I've heard around the office.
